A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing film! Bad writing\, lots of plot holes and more poor jokes than good ones. Even more unbelievable moments than one should expect in a sci-fi fantasy (e. g. Mary Poppins Leia and bombs dropped 'down' in zero gravity space). Did going to the casino even matter? Why was Holdo such a dick to Poe? Also\, who's Snoke? Who's Rey? Why is she so good at the Force without special parentage or training? So much wrong about this movie. It is sad.
